docs.snippet: As a seaside metropolis with a lively outdoor vibe and dozens of picturesque islands beckoning nearby, Athens is more often considered a summer tourist destination than a winter escape. But if you've got more than beaches on your mind, there's ple...
docs.lead_paragraph: As a seaside metropolis with a lively outdoor vibe and dozens of picturesque islands beckoning nearby, Athens is more often considered a summer tourist destination than a winter escape. But if you've got more than beaches on your mind, there's plenty of upside to a brief cool visit that avoids the crowds and heat of summer.

headline.main: A Winter Visit to Athens Offers a Pleasant Alternative
headline.print_headline: A Winter Visit to Athens Offers a Pleasant Alternative
